name: Disciple of the Aura
description:
A platformer game where you will have to learn to master a unique mechanic to overcome the challenges ahead!

Made in 10 days for Juice Jam II.

Assets used :

Fantasy Characters Pack Japan Set by Hajileee :

https://hajileee.itch.io/hajileees-fantasy-characters-pack-japan-set

Animated Character Pack by Szadiart :

https://szadiart.itch.io/animated-character-pack

Starry Night tileset by Quintino Pixels :

https://quintino-pixels.itch.io/starry-night

Free Footstsps Sound Effects by mayragandra :

https://mayragandra.itch.io/free-footsteps-sound-effects

Free Deadly Kombat Sound Effects by Danielsoundsgood :

https://danielsoundsgood.itch.io/free-deadly-kombat-sound-effects

Magic Attacks Bundle by Timothyadan :

https://timothyadan.itch.io/magic-attacks-bundle

Swishes by Makoto Hiramatsu :

https://makotohiramatsu.itch.io/swishes
